titles.title: To prohibit discrimination by the States on the basis of nonresidency in the licensing of dental health care professionals, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: 2/6/2001--Introduced. Prohibits a State from discriminating against a dental health care professional on the basis that such individual is a resident of another State or was first licensed to perform dental services in another State when considering such individual's application for a license to perform such services. Authorizes aggrieved individuals and the Attorney General to bring civil actions against States violating such prohibition.
